author: Prasant1993
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is for  saving only Fall17V2  Electron IDs and isolations in Run2. Same thing has been done for photons in PR #42255.
 

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix tests have been successfully run for the following workflow :

- runTheMatrix.py -l 12434.0



#### PR backport 
As pointed out by  Cross-POG convenors in the PR #42255 , we need backport to 13_0_X  for 2022 and 2023 data/MC processing.

Tagging EGM convenors @a-kapoor , @RSalvatico
title: Fall17V2  Electron IDs and Isolations saved only in Run2
